item.title: Cyclistic Bike-Share Case Study
item.description: Table of Contents Scenario In this case, I am assuming the role of a junior data analyst working in the marketing and analytics team at Cyclistic, a bike-share company in Chicago with two types of customers. The director of marketing believes the companyâ€™s future success depends on maximizing the number of annual memberships. Customers who buy single-ride or full-day passes are known as casual riders, while the customers who purchase annual memberships are known as members.
